Translations.Text: e visayanni gurinci varu (okarinokaru) prasnincukuntunnaru
a maha vartanu gurincena
Denini gurincaite varu bhedabhiprayalanu kaligi unnaro
adi kadu! Varu tvaralone danini telusukogalaru
enta matramu kadu! Varu tvaralone danini telusukogalaru
emi? Memu bhumini parupuga ceyaleda
mariyu parvatalanu mekuluga
mariyu memu mim'malni (stri-purusula) jantaluga srstincamu
mariyu memu nidranu, miku visranti niccediga cesamu
mariyu ratrini acchadanaga cesamu
mariyu pagatini jivanopadhi samayanga cesamu
mariyu memu mipaina patistamaina edu (akasalanu) nirmincamu
mariyu (andulo) prakasince dipanni (suryunni) uncamu
mariyu meghala nundi dharapatanga varsanni kuripincamu
danito memu dhan'yam mariyu paccikanu (cetlu cemalanu) perigincataniki
mariyu dattamaina totalanu
niscayanga, tirpudinam oka nirnita samayam
a roju baka udabadinappudu! Appudu miranta gumpulu gumpuluga leci vastaru
mariyu akasam teruvabadutundi, andulo dvaralu erpadutayi
mariyu parvatalu endamavuluga adrsyamai potayi
niscayanga, narakam oka matu
dhikkarula gamyasthanam
andulo varu yugala tarabadi untaru
andulo varu elanti calladananni gani mariyu (callani) paniyanni gani cavi cudaru
salasala kage niru mariyu cimu lanti muriki (paniyam) tappa
(vari karmalaku) tagina purti pratiphalanga
vastavaniki varu lekka tisukobadutundani asincaledu
paiga varu ma sucanalanu (ayat lanu) asatyalani tiraskarincaru
mariyu memu (varu cesina) pratidanini oka pustakanlo vrasi pettamu
kavuna miru (mi karmala phalitanni) cavi cudandi. Endukante, memu miku siksa tappa maremi adhikam ceyamu
niscayanga, daivabhiti galavariki saphalyam (svargam) undi
udyanavanalu, draksa totalu
mariyu idujodu gala (yavvana) sundara kan'yalu
Mariyu nindi porle (madhu) patra
andulo (svarganlo) varu elanti vyarthapu matalu gani, asatyalu gani vinaru
(idanta) ni prabhuvu taraphu nundi labhince pratiphalam, calinanta bahumanam
bhumyakasalu mariyu vati madhya unna samastaniki prabhuvaina ananta karunamayuni (bahumanam), ayana mundu matlade sahasam evvariki ledu

e rojunayite atma (jibril) mariyu devadutalu varusalalo nilici untaro! Appudu a ananta karunamayudu anumatincina vadu tappa, marevvaru matladaleru; okavela evadaina matladina atadu saraina mate matladutadu
ade antima satyadinam. Kavuna istamunnavadu, tana prabhuvu vaipunaku cere marganni avalambincali

niscayanga, memu atani samipanlo unna siksanu gurinci mim'malni heccarincamu. A roju prati manisi tana cejetula cesukoni mundu pampukunnadanta pratyaksanga cusukuntadu. Mariyu satyatiraskari: "Ayyo! Na paduganu! Nenu mattinayi unte enta bagundedi!" Ani vapotadu
(avisvasula pranalanu) kathinanga lagi tise vari (devadutala) saksiga
(visvasula pranalanu) nem'madiga tisevari (devadutala) saksiga
(visvanlo) teliyadutu poye vari saksiga
mariyu pandenlo vale (okarito nokaru) poti pade vari saksiga
mariyu (tama prabhuvu) ajnanusaram vyavaharalu nirvahincevari (devadutala) saksiga
a roju (modati) baka dhvani bhugolanni tivranga kampimpajestundi
dani tarvata rendava sari baka udabadutundi. (Appudu andaru punarut'tharimpa badataru)
a roju (konni) hrdayalu (bhayanto) dadadadaladutu untayi
vari cupulu krindiki vali untayi
varu ila antunnaru: "Emi? Manam mana purva sthitiloki malli tisuku rabadatama
manam sithilamaina emukaluga mari poyina taruvata kudana
Varu (inka ila) antaru: "Ayite i tirigi ravatamanedi cala nastadayakamainade
kani adi vastavaniki, oke oka (tivramaina) dhvani
appudu varandaru, okesari leci maidananloki vacci untaru
emi? Niku musa vrttantam andinda
atani prabhuvu pavitra tuva loyalo atanini pilicinappudu
(ila annadu): "Phir'aun vaddaku vellu, niscayanga, atadu dhikkarudayyadu
ika (atanito) itlanu: 'Emi? Nivu paparahitudavu avataniki istapadatava
mariyu nenu niku ni prabhuvu vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cestanu, mari nivu ayana patla bhiti kaligi untava
taruvata atanu (musa) atadiki (phir'aun ku) goppa adbhuta nidarsananni cupadu
kani atadu (phir'aun) danini abad'dhamani tiraskarincadu mariyu (atani matanu) ullanghincadu
a tarvata atadu (phir'aun) venakki marali poyi, (kutralu) pannasagadu
pidapa (prajalanu) samavesaparaci, elugetti catutu
ila annadu: "Nene mi yokka mahannata prabhuvunu
kavuna allah atanini ihaparalokala siksaku guri cesadu
niscayanga, indulo (allah ku) bhayapade prati vyakti koraku gunapathamundi
emi? Mim'malni srstincadam kathinamayina pana? Leka akasanna? Ayane kada danini nirmincindi
ayana dani kappu (ettu)nu cala paiki lepadu. Taruvata danini kramaparicadu
mariyu ayana dani ratrini cikatiga cesadu. Mariyu dani pagatini (velugunu) bahirgatam cesadu
mariyu a pidapa bhumini paracinatlu cesadu
dani nundi dani nillanu mariyu dani paccikanu bayatiki tisadu
mariyu parvatalanu (danilo) sthiranga natadu
miku mariyu mi pasuvulaku jivana samagriga
ika a goppa durghatana (punarut'thana dinam) vaccinappudu
a roju manavudu tanu cesindanta jnapakam cesukuntadu
Mariyu cuse vari yedutaku, narakagni spastanga kanabadetatlu tebadutundi
ika dhikkaranto haddulu miri pravartincina vadiki
mariyu aihika jivitaniki pradhan'yata niccina vadiki
niscayanga, narakagniye, vani nivasa sthanamavutundi
mariyu tana prabhuvu mundu nilabada valasi vuntundanna bhayanto tana manas'sunu dustavanchalaku duranga uncina vyaktiki
niscayanga, svargame, atani nivasa sthanamavutundi
(o muham'mad!) Viru ninnu - a ghadiyanu gurinci: "Asalu adi eppudostundi?" Ani adugutunnaru
dani gurinci ceppadaniki danto nikemi sambandham
dani vastava jnanam ni prabhuvuke undi
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, nivu, daniki bhayapade varini heccarince vadavu matrame
varu danini cusina roju (tamu prapancanlo) kevalam oka sayantramo leka oka udayamo gadipinatlu bhavistaru
atanu (pravakta) bhrkuti mudi vesukunnadu mariyu mukham trippukunnadu
a gruddivadu tana vaddaku vaccadani
kani nikem telusu? Bahusa atadu tananu tanu sanskarincukovaccu
leda atadu hitabodha pondavaccu mariyu a hitabodha ataniki prayojanakaram kavaccu
kani atadu, evadaite tananu tanu svayam samrd'dhudu, anukuntunnado
atani patla nivu asakti cuputunnavu
okavela atadu sanskarincukoka pote nipai badhyata emundi
kani, evadaite tanantata tanu, ni vaddaku parugettukuntu vaccado
mariyu (allah yedala) bhitiparudai unnado
atanini nivu nirlaksyam cestunnavu
ala kadu! Niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) oka hitopadesam
kavuna istamunnavaru dinini svikarincavaccu
idi pratisthakaramaina putalalo (vrayabadi unnadi)
mahonnatamainadi, pavitramainadi
lekhakula (devadutala) cetulalo
varu gauravaniyulaina satpurusulu (ajnanuvartanulu)
Manavudu nasanam ganu! Atadu enta krtaghnudu
ayana (allah) denito atanini srstincadu
atanini viryabinduvuto srstincadu taruvata atanini tagina vidhanga tircididdadu
a taruvata, atani marganni ataniki sulabhataram cesadu
apaina atanini maranimpajesi gori loki cercadu
malli ayana (allah) korinappudu atanini tirigi bratikinci lepadu
ala kadu, ayana (allah) adesincina danini (manavudu) neravercaledu
ika, manavudu tana aharanni gamanincali
niscayanga memu nitini (varsanni) enta puskalanga kuripincamu
a taruvata bhumini (molice mokkalato) cilcamu, oka adbhutamaina cilputo
taruvata danilo dhan'yanni pencamu
mariyu draksalanu mariyu kuragayalanu
mariyu aliv (jaitun) mariyu kharjurapu cetlanu
mariyu dattamaina totalanu
mariyu (rakarakala) pandlanu mariyu paccikalanu
miku mariyu mi pasuvulaku jivana samagriga
eppudaite, cevulanu cevitiga cese a goppa dhvani vastundo
a roju, manavudu tana sodaruni nundi duranga paripotadu
mariyu tana talli nundi mariyu tandri nundi
mariyu tana bharya (sahibati) nundi mariyu tana santanam nundi
a roju varilo prati manavuniki tananu gurinci matrame calinanta cinta untundi
a roju konni mukhalu anandanto prakasistu untayi
avi cirunavvulato anandotsahalato kalakalaladutuntayi
marikonni mukhalu a roju, dum'mu kottukoni (ento vyakulanto) nindi untayi
avi nallaga madipoyi untayi
alanti varu, vare! Satyatiraskarulaina dustulu
suryudu (andhakaranlo) cutti poyabadi kantihinudainappudu
mariyu naksatralu (kantini kolpoyi) ralipovunappudu
mariyu parvatalu kadilincabadinappudu
mariyu nindu sudi ontelu, nirapeksanga vadiliveyabadinappudu
Mariyu kruramrgalanni okaceta samakurcabadinappudu
mariyu samudralu uppongipoyi nappudu
mariyu atmalu (sariralato) tirigi kalupabadi nappudu
mariyu sajivanga pati pettabadina balika prasnincabadinappudu
e aparadhaniki tanu hatya ceyabadindani
mariyu karmapatralu teruvabadinappudu
mariyu akasam olici veyabadinappudu
mariyu narakagni mandincabadinappudu
mariyu svargam daggaraku tisukurabadinappudu
prati atma tanu cesi teccina karmalanu telusukuntundi
ala kadu! Nenu tolagipoye naksatrala saksiga cebutunnanu
(evaite) veganga tirugutu kanumarugavutunnayo
mariyu gadaci poye ratri saksiga
mariyu prakasince udayam saksiga
niscayanga, idi (i khur'an) gauravaniyudaina sandesaharudu teccina vakku
atanu (jibril) maha balasali, sinhasana (ars) adhipati sannidhilo unnata sthanam galavadu
atani ajnalu patimpabadatayi mariyu (atanu) visvasaniyudu
mariyu (o prajalara!) Mi sahacarudu piccivadu kadu
mariyu vastavanga, atanu a sandesaharunni (jibril nu) prakasavantamaina dinmandalanlo cusadu
mariyu atanu (muham'mad) agocara jnananni prajala nundi dacevadu kadu
mariyu idi (i khur'an) sapinca (bahiskarinca) badina saitan vakku kadu
mari miru etu potunnaru
idi (i khur'an) sarvalokalaku oka hitopadesam
milo, rjumarganlo nadava dalacukunna prativani koraku
mariyu sarvalokala prabhuvaina allah talacananta varaku, miru talacinanta matrana emi kadu
akasam cilcabadinappudu
mariyu naksatralu cediri poyinappudu
mariyu samudralu pongi porali poyinappudu
mariyu samadhulu pellagimpa (teruva) badinappudu
prati vyaktiki tanu cesi pampukunnadi mariyu venuka vadali pettindi anta telisi potundi
O manavuda! Paramadata ayina ni prabhuvunu gurinci, e visayam ninnu emarupatuku guri cesindi
ayane ninnu srstincadu, taruvata elanti lopam lekunda ninnu tircididdadu mariyu ninnu tagina pramananlo rupondincadu
tanu talacina akaranlo ninnu malicadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki miru (paraloka) tirpunu abad'dhamani tiraskaristunnaru
mariyu, niscayanga! Mim'malni kanipettukoni undevaru (devadutalu) unnaru
varu, gauravaniyulaina lekhakulu
miru cesedanta telusukunevaru
niscayanga punyatmulu sukhasantosalalo teliyadutu untaru
mariyu niscayanga, dustulu bhagabhaga mande narakagnilo untaru
tirpu dinamuna varu andulo pravesistaru
mariyu varu dani nundi enta matram tappincukoleru
mariyu a tirpudinam ante emito nikela telustundi
avunu mari! A tirpudinam ante emito nikela telustundi
a dinamuna e manavuniki kuda itaruniki elanti sahayam cese adhikaram undadu. Mariyu a roju nirnayadhikaram kevalam allah ke untundi
kolatalalo, tunikalalo tagginci icce variki vinasamundi
varu prajala nundi tisukunetappudu purtiga tisukuntaru
mariyu tamu prajalaku kolici gani leka tuci gani iccetappudu matram tagginci istaru
emi? Ilanti varu tirigi bratikinci lepabadarani bhavistunnara
oka goppa dinamuna
sarva lokala prabhuvu samaksanlo prajalu andaru nilabade roju
ala kadu! Niscayanga, dustula karmapatram sijjinulo undi
a sijjin ante nivu emanukuntunnavu
vrasi pettabadina (ceragani) grantham
satyanni tiraskarince variki a roju vinasamundi
varike! Evaraite tirpudinanni tiraskaristaro
mariyu mitimiri pravartince papisthudu tappa, marevvadu danini (tirpu dinanni) tiraskarincadu
Ma sucanalu (ayat lu) atadiki vinipinca badinappudu atadu: "Ivi purvakalapu kattukathale!" Ani antadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki vari hrdayalaku vari (dusta) karyala truppu pattindi
antekadu, a roju niscayanga, varu tama prabhuvu karunyam nundi nirodhimpa badataru
taruvata varu niscayanga, bhagabhaga mande narakagniloki potaru
appudu varito: "Deninaite miru asatyamani tiraskaristu vaccaro, adi ide!" Ani ceppabadutundi
ala kadu! Niscayanga, dharmanisthaparula (punyatmula) karmapatram mahonnata grantham (illiyyun)lo undi
mari a illiyyun ante nivu emanukuntunnavu
adi vrasipettabadina oka grantham
daniki, (allah ku) sannihitulaina varu (devadutalu) saksyanga untaru
niscayanga, punyatmulu sukhasantosalalo untaru
ettaina asanalapai kurconi (svargadrsyalanu) tilakistu
vari mukhalu sukhasantosalato kalakalaladutu undatam nivu custavu
silu ceyabadina nanyamaina madhuvu variki tragataniki ivvabadutundi
dani civari cukkalonu kasturi suvasana untundi. Kabatti danini pondataniki apeksince varanta prayasa padali
mariyu danilo (a madhuvulo) tasnim kalupabadi untundi
adoka celama, (allah) sannidhyam pondinavare dani nundi tragutaru
vastavaniki (prapancanlo) aparadhulu visvasincina varini helana cesevaru
mariyu viru (visvasulu), vari (avisvasula) yeduta nundi poyi nappudu, varu (avisvasulu) parasparam kanusaigalu cesukunevaru
mariyu (avisvasulu) tama inti vari daggariki poyinappudu (visvasulanu gurinci) parihasistu maralevaru
mariyu (visvasulanu) cusinapudalla: "Niscayanga, viru dari tappinavaru!" Ani anevaru
Mariyu varu (avisvasulu) viri (visvasula) mida kapaladaruluga pampabadaledu
kani i roju (punarut'thana dinam nadu) visvasincinavaru, satyatiraskarulanu cusi navvutaru
ettaina asanalapai kurconi (svargadrsyalanu) tilakistu (ila antaru)
ika! I satyatiraskarulaku, vari cestalaku tagina pratiphalam tappa maremaina dorukuna
akasam braddalayi poyinappudu
mariyu adi tana prabhuvu adesapalana cesindi mariyu ade dani vidhyukta dharmam
mariyu bhumi vistarimpajeyabadi (cadunuga ceyabadi) nappudu
mariyu adi tana lopala unnadanta bayatiki visarivesi, khali ayinappudu
adi tana prabhuvu adesapalana cesindi mariyu ade dani vidhyukta dharmam
o manavuda! Niscayanga, nivu ni prabhuvu vaipunaku, ni (manci-cedu) karmalanu tisukoni maralutunnavu, oka niscita maralpu. Appudu nivu ni (karmala phalitanni) pondutavu
appudu tana karmapatram kudicetilo ivvabadinavadi nundi
atani lekka ati telikaga tisukobadagaladu
mariyu atadu santosanga tana vari daggaraku maralipotadu
ika tana karmapatram vipu venuka nundi ivvabadinavadu
appudatadu tana nasananne - korukuntadu
mariyu atadu mandutunna narakagnilo padipotadu
vastavaniki, atadu (prapancanlo) tana vari madhya sukhasantosalalo munigi undevadu
vastavaniki, atadu (ma vaipuku) maraliradani bhavincevadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki, atani prabhuvu atanini gamanistu undevadu
kanuka, nenu sandhyakalapu erupu saksiga cebutunnanu
ratri saksiga, adi progu cesevati saksiga
purnacandruni saksiga
mirandaru tappanisariga oka sthiti nundi maroka sthitiki kramakramanga marutu povalasi untundi
ayite viri kemayindi? Viru enduku visvasincaru
Mariyu khur'an viri mundu pathimpabadinappudu virenduku sastangam (sajda) ceyaru
ala kadu! I satyatiraskarulu dinini asatyamantunnaru
mariyu varu kudabettedanta allah ku baga telusu
kabatti variki (paralokanlo) labhince vyadhabharitamaina siksa yokka vartanivvu
visvasinci satkaryalu cese variki tappa - variki ennatiki antam gani pratiphalam untundi
vistaramaina taraganam gala akasam saksiga
vagdanam ceyabadina (punarut'thana) dinam saksiga
cucedani (dinam) mariyu cudabade dani (dinam) saksiga
agni kandakam (ukhud) varu nasanam ceyabaddaru
indhananto tivranga mande agnini rajesevaru
varu dani (a kandakam) ancupai kurconi unnappudu
mariyu tamu visvasula patla cese ghora karyalanu (sajiva dahanalanu) tilakincevaru
mariyu varu visvasula patla kasi pencukovadaniki karanam - varu (visvasulu) sarvasaktimantudu, sarva stotralaku ar'hudaina - allah nu visvasincadam matrame
ayane! Evarikaite bhumyakasala adhipatyam undo! Mariyu allah ye pratidaniki saksi

evaraite visvasulaina purusulanu mariyu visvasulaina strilanu hinsistaro, a taruvata pascattapanto ksamapana koraro! Niscayanga, alanti variki narakasiksa untundi. Mariyu variki mande narakagni siksa vidhincabadutundi
niscayanga, visvasinci satkaryalu cesevari koraku krinda selayellu pravahince svargavanaluntayi. Ade goppa vijayam
niscayanga, ni prabhuvu yokka pattu (siksa) cala kathinamainadi
niscayanga, ayane (srstini) arambhincevadu mariyu ayane (danini) marala unikiloki teccevadu
mariyu ayana ksamasiludu, amita vatsalyudu
sinhasananni (ars nu) adhistincina vadu, mahattvapurnudu
tanu talacindi ceyagalavadu
Emi? Sain'yala vari samacaram niku andinda
phir'aun mariyu samud vari (sain'yala)
ala kadu, satyatiraskarulu (satyanni) tiraskarincutalo nimagnulai unnaru
mariyu allah varini venuka (prati dikku) nundi cuttumutti unnadu
vastavaniki, idi oka divyamaina khur'an
suraksitamaina phalakam (lauhe mah phuj) lo (vrayabadi) unnadi
akasam mariyu ratrivela vacce naksatram (at tarikh) saksiga
ratri vela vaccedi (at tarikh) ante emito niku ela telustundi
adoka atyanta prakasavantamaina naksatram
kanipettukoni undevadu (devaduta) lekunda e vyakti kuda ledu
kavuna manavudu tanu denito srstincabaddado gamanincali
atadu visarjincabade (cim'mukuntu veluvade) dravapadarthanto srstincabaddadu
adi vennu mariyu rom'mu emukala madhyabhagam nundi bayatiki vastundi
niscayanga, ayana (srstikarta), atanini marala bratikinci tegala samarthyam galavadu
e rojayite rahasya visayala vicarana jarugutundo
appudu ataniki (manavuniki) elanti sakti undadu mariyu e sahayakudunu undadu
varsam kuripince akasam saksiga
(cetlu molakettetappudu) cili poye bhumi saksiga
niscayanga, idi (i khur'an, satyasatyalanu) veru parace vakku (giturayi)
mariyu idi vrtha kalaksepaniki vaccinadi kadu
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, varu (niku virud'dhanga) kutrapannutunnaru
mariyu nenu kuda pannagam pannutunnanu
kanuka nivu satyatiraskarulaku konta vyavadhi nivvu! Vari patla mrduvuga vyavaharincu
atyunnatudaina ni prabhuvu namanni stutincu
ayane (pratidanini) srstincadu mariyu tagina pramananlo rupondincadu
mariyu ayane dani prakrti laksanalanu nirnayincadu, mariyu margam cupadu
Mariyu ayane paccikanu molipimpa jesadu
marala danini nallani cettacedaranga cesadu
memu niceta (khur'an nu) cadivimpa jestamu, taruvata nivu (danini) maracipovu
allah korindi tappa! Niscayanga, bahiranganga unnadi mariyu gopyanga unnadi anni ayanaku baga telusu
mariyu memu ni marganni sulabham ceyadaniki niku saulabhyanni kalugajestamu
kavuna nivu hitopadesam cestu undu; variki hitopadesam labhadayakam kavaccu
(allah ku) bhayapade vadu hitopadesanni svikaristadu
mariyu daurbhagyudu daniki duramai potadu
alanti vade ghoramaina narakagnilo padi kalutadu
appudu, atadu andulo cavanu ledu, bratakanu ledu
susilatanu (pavitratanu) patince vadu tappaka saphalyam pondutadu
mariyu tana prabhuvu namanni smaristu, namaj cestu undevadu
ala kadu! Miru aihika jivitaniki pradhan'yata nistunnaru
kani paraloka jivitame melainadi mariyu cirakalamundedi
niscayanga, i visayam purvagranthalalo (vrayabadi) undi
ibrahim mariyu musalapai (avatarimpajeyabadina) granthalalo
hathattuga asannamayye a vipattu (punarut'thana dinapu) samacaram niku andinda
konni mukhalu a roju vali (krungi) poyi untayi
(prapancanloni vrtha) sramaku, (paralokanlo jarige) avamananiki
varu dahince agnilo padi kalutaru
variki salasala kage celama niru tragataniki ivvabadutundi
variki cedu mullagadda (dari'a) tappa maroka aharam undadu
adi variki balamu niyyadu mariyu akali tircadu
a rojuna, marikonni mukhalu kalakalaladutu untayi
tamu cesukunna satkaryalaku (phalitalaku) varu santosapadutu untaru
atyunnatamaina svargavananlo
andulo varu elanti vrtha matalu vinaru
andulo pravahince selayellu untayi
andulo ettaina asanalu untayi
Mariyu percabadina (madhu) patralu
mariyu varusaluga veyabadina, dindlu
mariyu paracabadina nanyamaina tivacilu
emiti? Varu ontela vaipu cudara? Avi ela srstincabaddayo
mariyu akasam vaipuku (cudara)? Adi ela paiki ettabadi undo
mariyu kondala vaipuku cudara?Avi ela gattiga natabadi unnayo
mariyu bhumi vaipuku (cudara)? Adi ela visalanga paracabadi undo
kavuna (o muham'mad!) Nivu hitopadesam cestu undu, vastavaniki nivu kevalam hitopadesam cese vadavu matrame
nivu varini (visvasincamani) balavantam cesevadavu kavu
ika, evadaite venudirugutado mariyu satyanni tiraskaristado
appudu ataniki allah ghorasiksa vidhistadu
niscayanga, ma vaipunake vari maralimpu undi
a tarvata niscayanga, vari lekka tisukunedi meme
prantah kalam saksiga
padi ratrula saksiga
sari besila saksiga
gadacipoye ratri saksiga
vitilo bud'dhigala vani koraku e pramanamu leda emiti
ni prabhuvu ad (jati) vari patla ela vyavaharincado niku teliyada
ettaina sthambhala (bhavanalu gala) iram prajala patla
varilanti jati bhumilo ennadu srstincabadaledu
mariyu loyalaloni kondarallalo (bhavanalanu) tolicina samud jati patla
mariyu mekulavadaina phir'aun patla
varanta aya desalalo talabirusutananto pravartincaru
mariyu vatilo daurjan'yanni rekettincaru
kabatti ni prabhuvu varipaiki aneka rakala badhakaramaina siksalanu pampadu
vastavaniki, ni prabhuvu matu vesi unnadu (anta kanipedtu untadu)
ayite manavudu elanti vadante: Atani prabhuvu atanni pariksincataniki, ataniki gaurava pratistala nicci anugrahinci nappudu: "Na prabhuvu nannu gauravincadu." Ani antadu
Kani, atanni pariksincataniki, atani upadhini taggincinappudu: "Na prabhuvu nannu avamanincadu." Ani antadu
ala kadu, vastavaniki miru anathulanu adarincaru
mariyu miru pedalaku annam pette visayanlo okarinokaru protsahincukoru
mariyu varasatvapu astini perasato anta mire tinestaru
mariyu miru dhanavyamohanlo darunanga cikkuku poyaru
ala kadu, bhumi, danci pindipindiga ceyabadinapudu
mariyu ni prabhuvu (svayanga) vastadu mariyu devadutalu varusalalo vastaru
a roju narakam (munduku) tisuku rabadutundi. A roju manavudu (tana karmalanni) jnaptiki teccukuntadu; kani a roju jnaptiki teccukovadam valla ataniki kalige prayojanamemiti
atadu: "Ayyo! Na paduganu! Na i jivitam koraku nenu (satkaryalu) cesi pampu koni unte enta bagundedi!" Ani vapotadu
ayite, a roju, ayana (allah) siksincinatlu, marevvadu siksincaledu
mariyu ayana (allah) bandhincinatlu, marevvadu bandhincaledu
(sanmargunito ila anabadutundi): "O trpti pondina atma
ni prabhuvu sannidhiki marali ra! (Niku labhince satphalitaniki) anandistu mariyu (ni prabhuvunaku) priyamainadanivai
nivu (punyatmulaina) na dasulalo ceripo
mariyu nivu na svarganlo pravesincu
kadu, nenu i nagaram (makka) saksiga (antunnanu)
mariyu niku i nagaranlo (makkalo) sveccha undi
mariyu tandri (mulapurusudu) mariyu atani santanam saksiga
vastavaniki, memu manavunni sramajiviga puttincamu
emiti? Tananu evvadu vasaparacuko ledani atadu bhavistunnada
atadu: "Nenu viparita dhananni kharcu pettanu!" Ani antadu
emiti? Tananu evvadu cudatam ledani atadu bhavistunnada
emiti? Memu ataniki rendu kallu ivvaleda
Mariyu nalukanu mariyu rendu pedavulanu
mariyu ataniki (manci - cedu) ane spastamaina rendu margalanu cupamu
kani atadu kastataramaina urdhva gamananiki sahasincaledu
mariyu a urdhvagamanam ante emito niku telusa
adi okani medanu (banisatvam nundi) vidipincadam
leda! (Svayanga) akali goni unna roju kuda (itarulaku) annam pettadam
samipa anathuniki gani
leka, dikkuleni nirupedaku gani
mariyu visvasinci, sahananni bodhincevarilo! Mariyu karunanu okari kokaru bodhincukune varilo ceripovadam
ilanti vare kudipaksam varu
ika ma sandesalanu tiraskarincina varu, edama paksaniki cendinavaru
varini narakagni cuttukuntundi
suryuni mariyu dani enda saksiga
dani venuka vacce candruni saksiga
prakasince pagati saksiga
danini kram'mukune, ratri saksiga
akasam mariyu danini nirmincina ayana (allah) saksiga
bhumi mariyu danini vistarimpajesina ayana saksiga
manava atma mariyu danini tircididdina ayana saksiga
a taruvata ayane daniki dustatananni mariyu daivabhitini teliyajesadu
vastavaniki tana atmanu sud'dhaparacukunnavade saphaludavutadu
mariyu vastavaniki danini anaga drokkina vade viphaludavutadu
samud jati talabirusutananto (pravaktanu) asatyavadudavani tiraskarincindi; tamaloni parama dustudu (a duskaryam ceyataniki) lecinappudu
allah sandesaharudu (salih) varito: "I ada onte allah ku cendindi. Kabatti dinini (nillu) traganivvandi!" Ani annadu
ayina varu atani (salih) matanu abad'dhamani tiraskarincaru. Mariyu dani (a onte) venaka mokali naranni kosi, kuntidanni cesi camparu
Kabatti vari prabhuvu vari papaniki paryavasananga vari mida maha vipattunu pampi varandarini nasanam cesadu
mariyu ayana (allah) dani paryavasananni gurinci bhayapadaledu
kram'mukune ratri saksiga
prakasince pagati saksiga
mariyu, maga mariyu ada (jatulanu) srstincina ayana (allah) saksiga
vastavaniki, mi prayatnalu nana vidhaluga unnayi
kani evadaite (danadharmalu) cestu daivabhiti kaligi untado
mariyu mancini nam'mutado
ataniki memu melu koraku darini sulabham cestamu
kani evadaite pisinaritanam cestu, nirlaksya vaikharini avalambistado
mariyu mancini abad'dhamani tiraskaristado
ataniki memu cedu koraku darini sulabham cestamu
mariyu atadu nasinci poyinappudu, atani dhanam ataniki ela upayogapadutundi
niscayanga, sanmargam cupadam ma pani
mariyu niscayanga, ihaparalokala (adhipatyam) make cendinadi
kabatti nenu mim'malni prajvalince narakagnini gurinci heccarincanu
parama daurbhagyudu tappa, marevvadu andulo kaladu
evadaite (satyanni) tiraskarinci (dani nundi) vimukhudavutado
kani daivabhiti galavadu dani nundi (a narakagni nundi) duranga uncabadatadu
atade! Evadaite, pavitrudavataniki tana dhanam nundi (itarulaku) istado
kani adi, varu ataniki cesina e upakaraniki baduluga gaka
kevalam mahonnatudaina tana prabhuvu prasannatanu pondataniki matrame ayite
mariyu alanti vade tappaka santosistadu
prakasavantamaina prodduti puta (purvahnam) saksiga
mariyu cikati padda ratri saksiga
(o muham'mad!) Ni prabhuvu, ninnu tyajincanu ledu mariyu ninnu upeksincanu ledu
mariyu raboye kalam (jivitam) ni koraku modati kalam (jivitam) kante ento melainadi
Mariyu tvaralone ni prabhuvu niku (nivu koredi) prasadistadu. Danito nivu santosapadatavu
(o muham'mad!) Emi? Ninnu anathuniga cusi, ayana (allah) niku asrayam kalpincaleda
mariyu niku margam tocanappudu, ayana niku margadarsakatvam ceyaleda
mariyu ayana, pedavaniga cusi, ninnu sampannudiga ceyaleda
kabatti nivu anathula patla kathinanga pravartincaku
mariyu yacakunni kasarukoku
mariyu ni prabhuvu anugrahalanu bahiranganga prakatistu undu
(o muham'mad!) Emi? Memu ni koraku ni hrdayanni teruvaleda
mariyu memu ni bharanni ni pai nundi dinci veyaleda
edaite ni vennunu virustu undindo
mariyu ni peru pratisthanu paikettaleda
niscayanga, ellappudu kastanto patu sukham kuda untundi
niscayanga, kastanto patu sukham kuda untundi
kavuna niku tirika labhincinappudu aradhanalo nimagnudavaipo
mariyu ni prabhuvu nande dhyanam nilupu
anjuram (attipandu) mariyu jaitun saksiga
sinay (tur) konda saksiga
i santi nagaram (makka) saksiga
vastavanga! Memu manavudini sarvasresthamaina akaranlo srstincamu
taruvata memu atanni digajarci adhamati - adhamamaina sthitiki marcamu
kani visvasinci, satkaryalu cesevaru tappa! Endukante alanti variki antuleni pratiphalam undi
ayite (o manavuda!) Dini taruvata kuda nivu enduku pratiphaladinanni tiraskaristunnavu
emi? Allah n'yayadhipatulalokella sarvottama n'yayadhipati kada
caduvu! Ni prabhuvu peruto, ayane (sarvanni) srstincadu
ayane manavunni raktamuddato (jivakananto) srstincadu
caduvu! Mariyu ni prabhuvu paramadata
ayana kalam dvara nerpadu
manavudu erugani jnananni ataniki bodhincadu
Ala kadu! Vastavaniki, manavudu talabirusutananto pravartistadu
endukante, atadu tananu tanu nirapeksaparudiga bhavistadu
niscayanga ni prabhuvu vaipunake (andariki) marali povalasi undi
nivu nirodhince vyaktini cusava
namaj cese (allah) dasunni
okavela atanu (muham'mad!) Sanmargampai unte ni abhiprayamemiti
inka, daivabhitini gurinci adesistu unte
okavela (a nirodhince) vadu satyanni tiraskarincevadu mariyu sanmargam nundi vimukhudayyevadaite
vastavaniki, allah anta custunnadani ataniki teliyada
ala kadu! Okavela atadu manukokapote, memu atadini, nuduti juttu ventrukalanu patti idustamu
adi abad'dhalalo, aparadhalalo munigivunna nuduru
ayite, atanni tana anucarulanu pilucukomanu
memu kuda naraka dutalanu pilustamu
ala kadu! Nivu atani mata vinaku mariyu ayane (allah ke) sastangam (sajda) ceyyi mariyu ayana (allah) sannidhyanni pondataniki prayatnincu
niscayanga, memu dinini (i khur'an nu) ghanatagala a ratri (al khadar)lo avatarimpajesamu
mariyu a ghanata gala ratri ante emito nikem telusu
a ghanata gala ratri veyi nelala kante sresthamainadi
a ratrilo devadutalu mariyu atma (jibril), tama prabhuvu anumatito, prati vyavaharaniki sambandhincina) ajnalu tisukuni digi vastaru
a ratrilo tellavare varaku santi vardhillutundi
entavarakaite spastamaina nidarsanam rado! Anta varaku satyatiraskarulaina purvagrantha prajalu mariyu bahudaivaradhakulu (tama satyatiraskaranni) manukunevaru karu
allah taraphu nundi vaccina sandesaharudu, variki pavitra grantha putalanu vinipistunnadu
andulo samanjasamaina vratalu (satyopadesalu) unnayi
Mariyu spastamaina sucana vaccina tarvatane grantha prajalu bhedabhiprayalalo paddaru

mariyu varikiccina adesam: "Varu allah ne aradhincalani, purti ekagra cittanto tama dharmanni (bhaktini) kevalam ayana korake pratyekincukovalani, namaj nu sthapincalani mariyu jakat ivvalani. Ide saraina dharmamu
niscayanga, satyatiraskarulaina grantha prajalu mariyu bahudaivaradhakulu narakagniloki potaru. Varandulo sasvatanga untaru. Ilanti vare, srstilo atyanta nikrsta jivulu
niscayanga, visvasinci satkaryalu cesevaru, vare srstilo atyanta utkrsta jivulu

variki tama prabhuvu nundi labhince pratiphalam sasvatamaina svargavanalu. Vatilo krinda selayellu pravahistu untayi. Varu, vatilo sasvatanga kalakalamuntaru. Allah varito prasannudavutadu mariyu varu ayanato santustulavutaru. Ide tana prabhuvuku bhayapade vyaktiki labhince pratiphalam
bhumi tana ati tivramaina (antima) bhukampanto kampimpajeyabadinappudu
mariyu bhumi tana bharannanta tisi bayata pada vesinappudu
mariyu manavudu: "Diniki emayindi?" Ani annappudu
a roju adi tana samacaralanu vivaristundi
endukante, ni prabhuvu danini adesinci untadu
a roju prajalu tama tama karmalu cupincabadataniki ververu gumpulalo veltaru
appudu, prativadu tanu, ravvanta (paramanuvanta) mancini cesi unna, danini cusukuntadu
mariyu alage, prativadu tanu ravvanta (paramanuvanta) cedunu cesi unna, danini cusukuntadu
vagarcutu parigette gurrala saksiga
tama khurala tattulato agnikanalu lepevati
tellavarujhamuna dadi cesevati
(meghala vanti) dum'mu leputu
(satruvula) samuhanlo duripoye vati
niscayanga, manavudu tana prabhuvu patla ento krtaghnudu
Mariyu niscayanga, diniki svayanga atade saksi
mariyu niscayanga, atadu sirisampadala vyamohanlo purtiga munigi unnadu
emiti? Ataniki teliyada? Gorilalo unnadanta pellaginci bayatiki tiyabadinappudu
mariyu (manavula) hrdayalaloni visayalanni velladi ceyabadinappudu
niscayanga, a rojuna vari prabhuvu varini gurinci anta telusukoni untadani
a! Adaragotte maha upadravam
emita adaragotte maha upadravam
mariyu a adaragotte maha upadravam, ante emito nikem telusu
a roju manavulu cellaceduraina cim'metala vale ayipotaru
mariyu parvatalu rangu rangula ekina dudi vale ayi potayi
appudu evadi trasupallalu (satkaryalato) baruvuga untayo
atadu (svarganlo) sukhavantamaina jivitam gaduputadu
mariyu evadi (satkaryala) trasu pallalu telikaga untayo
atani nivasam adhah patalame
mariyu adi emito nikem telusu
adoka bhagabhagamande agni (gundam)
(ihaloka) perasa mim'malni emarupatulo padavesindi
miru gorilaloki cere varaku
ala kadu! Tvaralone miru telusu kuntaru
marokasari (vinandi)! Vastavanga, miru ati tvaralone telusukuntaru
enta matramu kadu! Okavela miru niscita jnananto telusukoni unte (mi vaikhari ila undedi kadu)
niscayanga, miru bhagabhaga mande narakagnini cudagalaru
malli antunnanu! Miru tappaka danini (narakagnini) nis'sankocamaina drstito cudagalaru
appudu, a roju miru (i jivitanlo anubhavincina) saukhyalanu gurinci tappaka prasnincabadataru
kalam saksiga
niscayanga manavudu nastanlo unnadu
kani visvasinci, satkaryalu cesevaru mariyu okarikokaru satyanni bodhincukune varu mariyu okarikokaru sahananni (sthairyanni) bodhincukune varu tappa
Apanindalu mope, cadilu ceppe prati okkadiki vinasam tappadu
evadaite dhananni kudabetti, mati matiki danni lekkabedutu untado
tana dhanam, tananu sasvatanga uncutundani atadu bhavistunnadu
enta matram kadu! Atadu (raboye jivitanlo) tappakunda anaga drokkabade narakagnilo veyabadatadu
a (anagadrokkabade) narakagni ante emito niku telusa
allah, tivranga prajvalimpajesina agni
adi gundela daka cerukuntundi
niscayanga, adi vari mida kram'mukontundi
podugati (agni) sthambhala vale
emi? Enuguvari (sain'yanto) ni prabhuvu ela vyavaharincado niku teliyada
emi? Ayana vari kutranu bhangam ceyaleda
mariyu ayana varipaiki paksula gumpulanu pampadu
avi (a paksulu) vari mida mattito cesi kalcina kankara rallanu (sijjil) visurutu poyayi
a vidhanga ayana varini (pasuvulu) tinivesina pottuga marci vesadu
(allah raksana mariyu ayana karunato) khuraisulu (prayanalaku) alavatu paddaru
(allah karuna mariyu ayana raksanato) varu sitakalapu mariyu vesavi kalapu prayanalu ceya galugutunnaru
kavuna varu a alaya (ka'abah) prabhuvu (allah)nu matrame aradhincali
varu akalito unnappudu ayane variki aharamiccadu mariyu ayane varini bhayam (pramadam) nundi kapadadu
tirpudinanni tiraskarince vyaktini nivu cusava
atade anathulanu kasari kottevadu
mariyu pedavallaku annam pettamani protsahincanivadu
kavuna namaj cese, (ituvanti) variki vinasam tappadu
evaraite tama namaj la patla asrad'dha vahistaro
evaraite pradarsanabud'dhito vyavaharistaro (namaj saluputaro)
mariyu (prajalaku) saman'ya upakaram (sahayam) kuda nirakaristaro
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, memu niku kausar prasadincamu
Kanuka nivu ni prabhuvu korake namaj ceyyi mariyu bali (khurbani) kuda (ayana korake) ivvu
niscayanga ni satruvu, vade! Veru tegina vadiga (varasudu, peru lekunda) ayipotadu
ila anu: "O satyatiraskarulara
miru aradhistunna vatini nenu aradhincanu
mariyu nenu aradhistunna ayananu (allah nu) miru aradhincevaru karu
mariyu miru aradhistunna vatini nenu aradhincevanni kanu
mariyu nenu aradhistunna ayananu miru aradhincevaru karu
mi dharmam miku mariyu na dharmam naku
(o muham'mad!) Eppudaite allah sahayam vastundo mariyu vijayam (labhistundo)
mariyu nivu prajalanu gumpulu gumpuluga allah dharmam (islam)lo pravesincadam custavo
appudu nivu ni prabhuvu stotranto patu ayana pavitratanu koniyadu mariyu ayana ksamabhiksanu arthincu. Niscayanga, ayane pascattapanni angikarincevadu
abu lahab rendu cetulu nasincugaka mariyu atadu kuda nasinci povu gaka
atadi dhanam mariyu atadi sampadana (santanam) atadiki e matram paniki ravu
atadu prajvalince narakagnilo kalcabadatadu
mariyu atadi bharya kuda! Kattelu mose (cadilu ceppi kalahalu rekettince) stri
ame medalo baga penini kharjurapunara tradu (masad) untundi
ila anu: "Ayane allah! Ekaikudu
allah! Evari akkara leni vadu
ayanaku santanam ledu (biddalanu kanadu) mariyu ayana kuda evari santanamu (evariki janmincina vadunu) kadu
mariyu (sarvalokalalo) ayanato polcadaginadi edi ledu
ila anu: "Nenu udaya kalapu prabhuvu ayina (allah) saranu vedukuntunnanu
ayana srstincina pratidani kidu nundi
mariyu cim'macikati kidu nundi, eppudaite adi kram'mukuntundo
mariyu mudula mida mantrinci ude vari kidu nundi
Mariyu asuyaparudi kidu nundi, eppudaite atadu asuyapadatado
ila anu: "Nenu manavula prabhuvu (allah) nu saranukai vedukuntunnanu
manavula sarvabhaumudu
manavula aradhyadaivam (ayina allah yokka saranu)
kalatalu rekettinci tolagipoyevani kidu nundi
evadaite manavula hrdayalalo kalatalu rekettistado
vadu jinnatulaloni vadu kavaccu leda manavulaloni vadu kavaccu
